name: Arran Zeyu Wang
bio: Arran Zeyu Wang is a fourth-year PhD student in the Department of Computer Science at the University of North Carolina-Chapel Hill.

name: Danielle Albers Szafir
bio: Danielle Albers Szafir is an Associate Professor in the Department of Computer Science at the University of North Carolina-Chapel Hill. Her work includes collaboration and publication in both visualization and psychology, including as an organizing member of both the VisxVision and VisPsych initiatives.
